description: Python wrapper for the SUGGEST, which is a Top-N recommendation engine that implements a variety of recommendation algorithms for collaborative filtering.

info.Author:: Python wrapper by Ricardo Niederberger Cabral. Recommendation engine by George Karypis (http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/suggest/overview)

longdescription: Python wrapper for the SUGGEST, which is a Top-N recommendation engine that implements a variety of recommendation algorithms for collaborative filtering.
